wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square            <div class="article-list article-list--bulleted">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/sarasota-county/police-investigating-shooting-at-sarasota-county-fair/">
                 Police investigating shooting at Sarasota County Fair
                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                   </style>
                  </defs>
                  <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </article>

           <div class="article-list article-list--top-story">
            <h3 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--hidden">
             Top Stories
            </h3>
            <div class="article-list__content">
             <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/8-on-your-side/covid-vaccine-what-to-do-if-you-miss-6-week-deadline-to-get-your-second-dose/">

             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/florida/florida-surpasses-2-million-total-covid-19-cases/">
                 Florida surpasses 2 million total COVID-19 cases
                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                 <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                  <defs>
                   <style>
                    .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                   </style>
                  </defs>
                  <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/community/health/coronavirus/new-initiative-seeks-to-reach-people-hesitant-about-covid-vaccine-dispel-myths/">
                 New initiative seeks to reach people hesitant about COVID vaccine, dispel myths
                </a>
               </h4>
               <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">

                   <style>

                  </path>
                 </svg>
                </span>
                <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
                 Video

    </div>
    <div class="site-content" id="content">
     <aside class="ad-unit ad-unit--leaderboard">
      <div class="ad-unit__content">
       <div data-path="/5678/mg.wfla/home" data-slot='{"pos":"billboard1","is_companion":true,"is_oop":false,"refresh_on_resize":true,"size":[320,50],"sizes":[[[1280,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[1024,0],[[728,90],[970,250],[970,90],[970,30]]],[[768,0],[[320,50]]],[[641,0],[[320,50]]],[[0,0],[[320,50]]]],"amp_multi_size":"320x50","lazyload":false,"wx_targeting":[],"module_refreshable":false,"fold":"atf"}' data-targeting='{"pos":"billboard1","fold":"atf","category":"","kw":"\/"}' data-unit='{"tag":"billboard1","tag_id":"billboard1","dfp_id":"5678","tag_name":"mg.wfla","ad_disabled":"0","facebook_only":""}' id="acm-ad-tag-billboard1-billboard1">
       </div>
       <script>
        (function () {   try {    var event = new CustomEvent(     "nsDfpSlotRendered",     {      detail: {       id: 'acm-ad-tag-billboard1-billboard1'      }     }    );     window.dispatchEvent(event);   } catch (err) {}  })();
       </script>
      </div>
     </aside>
     <div class="zone-container--below-supernav">
      <section class="widget_text widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_custom_html" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="custom_html-129">
       <div class="textwidget custom-html-widget">
        <div class="rich-text-cascade">
         <!-- ****************************************************************************************** -->
         <!-- ****************************************************************************************** -->
         <!-- ****************************************************************************************** -->
         <script>
          var now = new Date();
window.minute = now.getMinutes();

let xmlURL = "https://www.wfla.com/top-stories/app-feed";
// let xmlURL = "https://media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/temp/one_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "https://media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/temp/both_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "https://media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/temp/three_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "https://media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/temp/four_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "./one_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "./both_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "./three_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "./four_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;
// let xmlURL = "./bad_live_streams.xml?v=" + window.minute;

let getXMLFile = function(path, callback) {
	let request = new XMLHttpRequest();
	request.open("GET", path);
	request.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "text/xml");
	request.onreadystatechange = function() {
		if (request.readyState === 4 && request.status === 200) {
			callback(request.responseXML);
		}
	};
	request.send();
};

getXMLFile(xmlURL, function(xml) {
	let data = new XMLSerializer().serializeToString(xml);
	let parser = new DOMParser();
	let	xmlDoc = parser.parseFromString(data, "text/xml");
	let items = xmlDoc.getElementsByTagName("item")

	let aryItems = [null , null]; // prime the first two items to help manage priority
	let topStories = '';
	let ktr = 0;
	for (let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
		let title = items[i].getElementsByTagName("title")[0].innerHTML;
		let desc = items[i].getElementsByTagName("description")[0].innerHTML;
		let abstract = items[i].getElementsByTagName("abstract")[0].innerHTML;
		let link = items[i].getElementsByTagName("link")[0].innerHTML;

		// clean up abstract by removing CDATA tags
		abstract = abstract.replace("<![CDATA[", "");
		abstract = abstract.replace("]]>", "");


		if (desc.indexOf("<p>......") >= 0 && desc.match(/\?key=([^"]+)/) != null ) {

			console.log("<p>...... was found");

			let streamKey = desc.match(/\?key=([^"]+)/)[1];
			console.log(`streamkey: |${streamKey}|`);

			let jsonConfig = window.atob(streamKey); // atob = "ASCII to Bindary"
			let objJSON = JSON.parse(jsonConfig);

			console.log(`jsonConfig: ${jsonConfig}`);

			objJSON.autoplay = true;
			objJSON.width = "100%";
			objJSON.video = objJSON.v
			objJSON.mcp = objJSON.m;
			objJSON.share = false;
			objJSON.control = false;
			objJSON.volume = 0;
			delete objJSON.v;
			delete objJSON.m;
			delete objJSON.height;
			delete objJSON.plugins.dfp;

			let strJSON = JSON.stringify(objJSON);

			console.log(`strJSON: ${decodeURIComponent(encodeURIComponent(strJSON))}`);

			streamKey = window.btoa(decodeURIComponent(encodeURIComponent(strJSON))); // btoa = binary to ASCII

			if (objJSON.video === "adsto6qwebKAmQ3Y") {  // Stream B
				aryItems[0] = {"streamKey" : streamKey, "title" : title, "abstract" : abstract, "link" : link}

			} else if (objJSON.video === "adstQow2m5pJe5ME") {  // Stream A
				aryItems[1] = {"streamKey" : streamKey, "title" : title, "abstract" : abstract, "link" : link}

			} else {
				aryItems.push({"streamKey" : streamKey, "title" : title, "abstract" : abstract, "link" : link});
			}

		} else {
			if (desc.match(/\?key=([^"]+)/) === null) {
				console.log("<p>...... was found but REGEX for ?key returned null");
			} else {
				console.log("<p>...... was NOT found");
			}

			// collect stories for "more stories list"
			if (ktr < 4) {
				topStories += `<li><a href="${link}">${title}</a></li>` + "\n";
			}
			ktr++;
		}

	}

	// aryItems.unshift(null);

	var filteredItems = aryItems.filter(function (el) {
		return el != null;
	});

	console.log(filteredItems);

	window.alertbarExists = false;
	if (filteredItems.length > 0) {
		window.alertbarExists = true;
		window.alertbar = buildBaseStyles();
	}

	console.log(`filteredItems.length: ${filteredItems.length}`)
	if(filteredItems.length === 1) {
		// build display for one
		window.alertbar += buildDisplayForOne(filteredItems, topStories);

	} else if(filteredItems.length === 2) {
		// build display for two
		window.alertbar += buildDisplayForTwo(filteredItems);

	} else if(filteredItems.length === 3) {
		// build display for three
		window.alertbar += buildDisplayForThree(filteredItems);

	} else if(filteredItems.length >= 4) {
		// build display for four
		window.alertbar += buildDisplayForFour(filteredItems);
	}

	if (window.alertbarExists) {
		if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
			appendVidBarToMasthead();
			sixteenByNineFirstIndex("#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
		} else {
			prependVidBarToContent();
		}
	}
});



//		 ██╗     ██╗███████╗████████╗███████╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗
//		 ██║     ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝
//		 ██║     ██║███████╗   ██║   █████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝███████╗
//		 ██║     ██║╚════██║   ██║   ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚════██║
//		 ███████╗██║███████║   ██║   ███████╗██║ ╚████║███████╗██║  ██║███████║
//		 ╚══════╝╚═╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝


window.addEventListener('scroll', function(e) {
	if (window.alertbarExists) {
		let videoNav = document.querySelector("#kxan_live_container");
		let pipFrame = document.querySelector(".kxan_pip_frame");
		let masthead = document.querySelector("#masthead");
		let content = document.querySelector("#content");

		// console.log(' ------------------------------------------- ');
		// console.log(`window.innerWidth: ${window.innerWidth}`);
		// console.log(`masthead: ${masthead}`);
		// console.log(`alertbar: ${window.alertbar}`);

		// appendVidBarToMasthead();

		if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
			if (canYouSeeMe(".is-scrolling--top") == false) {
				videoNav.classList.remove("kxan_show_me");
				videoNav.classList.add("kxan_hide_me");

				pipFrame.classList.remove("kxan_hide_me");
				pipFrame.classList.add("kxan_show_me");


				sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video');
				sixteenByNineFirstIndex("div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
			} else {
				videoNav.classList.remove("kxan_hide_me");
				videoNav.classList.add("kxan_show_me");

				pipFrame.classList.remove("kxan_show_me");
				pipFrame.classList.add("kxan_hide_me");

				sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video');
				// sixteenByNineFirstIndex(".kxan_live_click_block");
				sixteenByNineFirstIndex("#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
			}
		} else {
			// prependVidBarToContent()
		}
	}

});

window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
	if (window.alertbarExists) {
		console.log('page resize');
		sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video')
		sixteenByNineFirstIndex("#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
	}
});

// window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
// 	console.log('page resize');
// 	// sixteenByNineFirstIndex(".kxan_live_video");
// 	// sixteenByNineFirstIndex('.kxan_live_video > iframe.kxan_live_video')
// 	// sixteenByNineFirstIndex(".kxan_live_click_block");
// 	// sixteenByNineFirstIndex("#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
// 	// kxan_live_video
// }, false);

window.addEventListener('load', function() {
	if (window.alertbarExists) {
		sixteenByNineFirstIndex("#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block");
	}
}, false);




//		███████╗██╗   ██╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗
//		██╔════╝██║   ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝
//		█████╗  ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗
//		██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║
//		██║     ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████║
//		╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝


function prependVidBarToContent() {
	console.log(`prependVidBarToContent()`);

	try {
		let oldVidNav = document.querySelector("#kxan_video_nav");
		oldVidNav.remove();
	} catch(e) {
		console.log(`Error when selecting #kxan_video_nav: ${e}`);
	}

	// Build a housing and insert the alertbar content
	let vidNav = document.createElement("div");
	vidNav.setAttribute("id", "kxan_video_nav");
	vidNav.innerHTML = window.alertbar;

	let content = document.querySelector("#content");
	content.prepend(vidNav);
}

function appendVidBarToMasthead() {
	console.log(`appendVidBarToMasthead()`);

	// Build a housing and insert the alertbar content
	let vidNav = document.createElement("div");
	vidNav.setAttribute("id", "kxan_video_nav");
	vidNav.innerHTML = window.alertbar;

	let masthead = document.querySelector("#masthead");
	masthead.append(vidNav);
}


function sixteenByNineFirstIndex(element) {
	let ele = document.querySelectorAll(element);

	console.log(`sixteenByNineFirstIndex("${element})" -----------------------------------`);

	console.log('ele:');
	console.log(ele);

	if (typeof ele !== 'undefined' && ele.length > 0) {
	    // the variable is defined and has nodes
	    let eleW = ele[0].offsetWidth;
		let newH = (eleW / 16 * 9) + 1;
		let ktr = 0;

		do {
			eleW = ele[0].offsetWidth;
			newH = (eleW / 16 * 9) + 1;

			ktr++;
			console.log(`eleW: ${eleW} | newH: ${newH} | ktr: ${ktr}`);

			if (ktr > 100) {break;}
		} while(newH < 10)

		for (i = 0; i < ele.length; i++) {
			ele[i].style.height = newH + 'px';
			console.log(`sixteenByNineFirstIndex("${element})" :: newH = ${newH}`);
		}

	}

	console.log(`------------------------------------------------------------------`);
}


function closePip(selector) {
	let ele = document.querySelector(selector);
	ele.remove();
}

function canYouSeeMe(selector) {

	let element = document.querySelector(selector);
	let rtn = null;

	try {
		let elePos = element.getBoundingClientRect();

		// // checking whether fully visible
		if(elePos.top >= 0 && elePos.bottom <= window.innerHeight) {
			// console.log('Whole element on screen');
			rtn =  true;
		} else {
			rtn =  false;
		}

		// checking for partial visibility
		// if(elePos.top < window.innerHeight && elePos.bottom >= 0) {
		// 	// console.log('Partial element on screen');
		// 	rtn =  true;
		// } else {
		// 	rtn =  false;
		// }

	} catch {
		rtn =  false;
	}


	console.log(`canYouSeeMe(${selector}) :: ${rtn}`);
	return rtn;
}



//       ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗
//      ██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝
//      ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗
//      ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝
//      ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗
//       ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝

function buildDisplayForOne(items, topStories) {
	return `
		<div class="kxan_pip_frame throwing_shade kxan_hide_me">
			<div class="kxan_alert_subhead"><div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div><span class="kxan_live_close_pip" onclick="closePip('.kxan_pip_frame')">X</span></div>
			<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
				<a href="${items[0]["link"]}">
					<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
				</a>
				<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[0]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay"  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_pip_frame > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
			</div>
			<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[0]["link"]}">${items[0]["title"]}</a></div>
		</div>
		<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="//media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/news/kxan_live_bar/one_video.css?v=${window.minute}"> -->
		<div id="kxan_live_container" class="kxan_live_alert_block">
			<div class="kxan_live_prime">
				<div class="kxan_live_side_open">
				<div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[0]["link"]}">${items[0]["title"]}</a></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_abstract">${items[0]["abstract"]}</div>
				</div>
				<div class="kxan_live_vid_block"><a href="${items[0]["link"]}">
						<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
					</a><iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[0]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay"  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe></div>
			</div>
			<div class="kxan_live_top_stories_list">
				<div class="kxan_live_title">Top Stories</div>
				<ul>${topStories}</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
	`;
}





//      ████████╗██╗    ██╗ ██████╗
//      ╚══██╔══╝██║    ██║██╔═══██╗
//         ██║   ██║ █╗ ██║██║   ██║
//         ██║   ██║███╗██║██║   ██║
//         ██║   ╚███╔███╔╝╚██████╔╝
//         ╚═╝    ╚══╝╚══╝  ╚═════╝

function buildDisplayForTwo(items) {
	let vidbar = '';
	let hierarchy = 'kxan_live_primary';
	let firstLoop = true;

	// console.log(items);

	for(let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
		// console.log(items[i].title)
		let logo = kxanLiveLogo();

		if (firstLoop) {
			vidbar += `
				<div class="kxan_pip_frame throwing_shade kxan_hide_me">
					<div class="kxan_alert_subhead"><div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div><span class="kxan_live_close_pip" onclick="closePip('.kxan_pip_frame')">X</span></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
						<a href="${items[i]["link"]}">
							<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
						</a>
						<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay""  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_pip_frame > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
					</div>
					<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
				</div>

				<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="//media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/news/kxan_live_bar/two_video.css?v=${window.minute}"> -->
				<div id="kxan_live_container" class="kxan_live_alert_block">
			`;

			firstLoop = false;
		}

		vidbar += `
			<div class="kxan_live_prime">
				<div class="kxan_live_side_open">
				<div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_abstract">${items[i]["abstract"]}</div>
				</div>
				<div class="kxan_live_vid_block"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">
						<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
					</a><iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay"  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe></div>
			</div>
		`;
	}

	vidbar += `
		</div>
		<style>
			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
				width: 49%;
			}

			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime:last-child {
				float: right;
			}

			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
				margin: 0;
				padding-bottom: 0;
			}

			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
				padding: 0 .5em 0 0;
			}

			@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
					width: 100%;
					float: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(2) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
					padding: 0;
				}

			}

		</style>
	`;

	return vidbar;
}



//      ████████╗██╗  ██╗██████╗ ███████╗███████╗
//      ╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝
//         ██║   ███████║██████╔╝█████╗  █████╗
//         ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝
//         ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗███████╗
//         ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

function buildDisplayForThree(items) {
	let vidbar = '';
	let hierarchy = 'kxan_live_primary';
	let firstLoop = true;

	// console.log(items);

	for(let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
		console.log(`firstLoop: ${firstLoop}`);
		let logo = logoPlaceholder();

		if (firstLoop) {
			logo = kxanLiveLogo();
			vidbar += `
				<div class="kxan_pip_frame throwing_shade kxan_hide_me">
					<div class="kxan_alert_subhead"><div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div><span class="kxan_live_close_pip" onclick="closePip('.kxan_pip_frame')">X</span></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
						<a href="${items[i]["link"]}">
							<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
						</a>
						<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay""  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_pip_frame > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
					</div>
					<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
				</div>

				<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="//media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/news/kxan_live_bar/two_video.css?v=${window.minute}"> -->
				<div id="kxan_live_container" class="kxan_live_alert_block">
			`;

			firstLoop = false;
		}

		vidbar += `
			<div class="kxan_live_prime">
				<div class="kxan_live_side_open">
				<div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div>

				</div>
				<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
					<a href="${items[i]["link"]}"><div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div></a>
					<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay"  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
					<div class="kxan_live_inside_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
				</div>
			</div>
		`;
	}

	vidbar += `
		</div>
		<style>
			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
				width: 32.5%;
				padding: 0 1em 0 0;
			}

			.kxan_live_logo {
				width: 33% !important;
				margin: 0 0 .5em 0 !important;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > div.kxan_live_inside_title {
				position: absolute;
				bottom: 0;
				left: 0;
				width: 100%;
				padding: .5em;
				background-image: url('https://www.kxan.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/40/2020/02/fade_opaque_70.png');
			}

			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime:last-child {
				float: none;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime:last-child {
				float: right;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
				margin: 0;
				padding-bottom: 0;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
				width: 100%
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block {
				width: 100% !important;
			}

			@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
					width: 100%;
					float: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(2) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(3) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}


				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
					padding: 0;
				}

			}

		</style>
	`;

	return vidbar;
}



//      ███████╗ ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗
//      ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗
//      █████╗  ██║   ██║██║   ██║██████╔╝
//      ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔══██╗
//      ██║     ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██║  ██║
//      ╚═╝      ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝

function buildDisplayForFour(items) {
	let vidbar = '';
	let hierarchy = 'kxan_live_primary';
	let firstLoop = true;

	// console.log(items);

	for(let i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
		console.log(`firstLoop: ${firstLoop}`);
		let logo = logoPlaceholder();

		if (firstLoop) {
			logo = kxanLiveLogo();
			vidbar += `
				<div class="kxan_pip_frame throwing_shade kxan_hide_me">
					<div class="kxan_alert_subhead"><div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div><span class="kxan_live_close_pip" onclick="closePip('.kxan_pip_frame')">X</span></div>
					<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
						<a href="${items[i]["link"]}">
							<div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div>
						</a>
						<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay""  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_pip_frame > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
					</div>
					<div class="kxan_live_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
				</div>

				<!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="//media.kxan.com/nxs-kxantv-media-us-east-1/misc/news/kxan_live_bar/two_video.css?v=${window.minute}"> -->
				<div id="kxan_live_container" class="kxan_live_alert_block">
			`;

			firstLoop = false;
		}

		vidbar += `
			<div class="kxan_live_prime">
				<div class="kxan_live_side_open">
				<div class="kxan_live_logo"><img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2020/04/WFLA-NOW-LOGO-USE.png"></div>

				</div>
				<div class="kxan_live_vid_block">
					<a href="${items[i]["link"]}"><div class="kxan_live_click_block"></div></a>
					<iframe class="kxan_live_video  throwing_shade" width="100%" height="206" src="https://w3.cdn.anvato.net/player/prod/v3/anvload.html?key=${items[i]["streamKey"]}&autoplay=1" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay"  onload=" sixteenByNineFirstIndex('div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > iframe.kxan_live_video')"></iframe>
					<div class="kxan_live_inside_title"><a href="${items[i]["link"]}">${items[i]["title"]}</a></div>
				</div>
			</div>
		`;
	}

	vidbar += `
		</div>
		<style>
			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
				width: 25%;
				padding: 0 1em 0 0;
			}

			.kxan_live_logo {
				width: 50% !important;
				margin: 0 0 .5em 0 !important;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block > div.kxan_live_inside_title {
				position: absolute;
				bottom: 0;
				left: 0;
				width: 100%;
				padding: .5em;
				background-image: url('https://www.kxan.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/40/2020/02/fade_opaque_70.png');
			}

			#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime:last-child {
				float: none;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime:last-child {
				float: right;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
				margin: 0;
				padding-bottom: 0;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
				width: 100%
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block {
				width: 100% !important;
			}

			@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime {
					width: 100%;
					float: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
					width: 33% !important;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(2) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(3) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div:nth-child(4) > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_logo {
					display: none;
				}


				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
					margin: 0 0 .5em 0;
				}

				#kxan_live_container > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open {
					padding: 0;
				}

			}

		</style>
	`;

	return vidbar;
}


function buildBaseStyles() {
	return `
		<style>

		iframe.kxan_live_video {
			min-height: 100px;
		}

		:root {
			--accent-border: #999999;
		}

		html {
		  box-sizing: border-box;
		}

		*, *:before, *:after {
		  box-sizing: inherit;
		}

		.dropnav { z-index: 1000; }
		.ad-unit--adhesion { z-index: 400; }
		.throwing_shade { box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); }

		.shadow {
			box-shadow: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
		}

		.kxan_live_logo {
			width: 50%;
			margin: 0 0 1em 0;
			display: inline-block;
		}

		.kxan_live_alert_block {
			display: inline-block;
			max-width: 1216px;
			margin: 0 auto;
			font-family: Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;
			background-color: #2c5fa8;
			color: #ffffff;
			padding: 0em;
			width: 100%;
			text-align: left;
		}

		#kxan_video_nav {
			display: flex;
			background-color: #2c5fa8;
		}

		.kxan_live_alert_block a {
			color: #ffffff;
			text-decoration: none;
		}

		.kxan_live_prime {
			display: inline-block;
			float: left;
			margin: 1em 0;
			width: 65%;
		}

		.kxan_live_abstract {
			font-size: .8em;
		}

		div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block {
			display: inline-block;
			width: 50%;
			float: left;
			position: relative;
		}

		.kxan_live_video {
			border: 1px solid #454545;
		}

		.kxan_live_click_block {
			display: inline-block;
			width: 100%;
			height: 206;
			position: absolute;
			top: 0;
			left: 0;

		}

		.kxan_live_side_open {
			display: inline-block;
			width: 50%;
			float: left;
			padding: 0 1em 0 0;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list {
			display: inline-block;
			float: right;
			width: 32%;
			margin: 1em 0 0 1em;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list ul {
			list-style-type: none;
			display: inline-block;
			padding: 0;
			margin: 0;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list ul li {
			margin: 0 0 1em 0;
			font-size: .8em;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list ul li a {
			color: #ffffff;
			text-decoration: none;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list ul li a:hover {
			text-decoration: underline;
		}

		div.kxan_live_title {
			font-weight: 600;
			margin: 0 1em .5em 0;
			padding-bottom: .5em;
		}

		.kxan_live_top_stories_list .kxan_live_title {
			border-bottom: 1px solid var(--accent-border);
		}

		.kxan_alert_subhead {
			font-size: 1.17em;
			font-weight: bold;
			color: #ffffff;
			margin: 0;
			padding: 0;
			border: 0;
			box-sizing: border-box;
			vertical-align: baseline;

			font-weight: bold;
			color: #ffffff;
			color: white;
			margin-bottom: .25em;
		}

		.kxan_alert_subhead span.kxan_live_on_air {
			background-color: #cc1f3b;
			border-radius: .75rem;
			content: " ";
			display: inline-block;
			height: .75rem;
			width: .75rem;
			margin: .3rem .3rem 0 0;
			border: 1px solid var(--accent-border);
		}

		.kxan_alert_subhead span.kxan_live_close_pip {
			float: right;
			font-family: monospace;
			cursor: pointer;
		}

		.kxan_pip_frame {
			font-family: Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;
			position: fixed !important;
			z-index: 3 !important;
			display: block;
			padding: 1em !important;
			margin: 1em !important;
			text-align: left;
			background-color: #2c5fa8;
			bottom: 2em;
			right: 1em;
			max-width: 300px;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_vid_block {
			width: 100%;
			position:relative;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_vid_block > a > div.kxan_live_click_block {
			postion: absolute;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_title {
			margin: .75em 0 0 0;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_title a {
			color: #ffffff;
			text-decoration: none;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_live_title a:hover {
			text-decoration: underline;
		}

		div.kxan_pip_frame > div.kxan_alert_subhead > div.kxan_live_logo {
			margin: 0;
		}

		@media only screen and (max-width:1290px) {
			.kxan_live_alert_block {
				padding: 0 1em;
			}
		}

		@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

			.kxan_live_top_stories_list {
				display: none;
			}

			.kxan_live_prime {
				border: 0;
				width: 100%;
				padding: 0;
			}

			.kxan_live_alert_block > div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_side_open > div.kxan_live_title {
				margin: 0;
			}

			.kxan_live_abstract {
				display: none;
			}

			div.kxan_live_prime > div.kxan_live_vid_block {
				width: 100%
			}

			.kxan_live_side_open {
				margin: 0;
				width: 100%

			}

		}

		.kxan_hide_me {
			display: none;
		}

		.kxan_show_me {
			display: inline-block;
		}

		</style>
	`;
}

function logoPlaceholder() {
	return `<img src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2019/05/wfla_digitalbrand-min.png"></svg>`;
}

         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Florida surpasses 2 million total COVID-19 cases" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/florida/florida-surpasses-2-million-total-covid-19-cases/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-2" data-link-label="Florida" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="2" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/florida/">
            Florida
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-20T20:15:58-04:00">
            4 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

              </a>

             </footer>

           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="934134" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="1">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>

              </a>

              </a>

               4 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/national/firefighters-question-discipline-against-major-who-drove-burned-girl-to-hospital/">
               Firefighters question discipline against major who drove burned girl to hospital
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/national/">
               National
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-20T16:30:00-04:00">
               8 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/national/firefighters-question-discipline-against-major-who-drove-burned-girl-to-hospital/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6452303">

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/community/health/coronavirus/new-initiative-seeks-to-reach-people-hesitant-about-covid-vaccine-dispel-myths/">
               New initiative seeks to reach people hesitant about COVID vaccine, dispel myths
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/community/health/coronavirus/">
               Coronavirus
              </a>
              /

               16 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">

               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6449744">

                 Video
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="933758" data-collection="article-list2" data-index="12">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/animals/elephant-charges-man-2-year-old-who-got-inside-san-diego-zoo-enclosure/">
               Elephant charges man, 2-year-old who got inside San Diego Zoo enclosure
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

               Animals
              </a>

               18 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list2" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/sports/wrestlemania-tickets-on-sale-now-for-2-night-wwe-event-at-raymond-james-stadium/">
               WrestleMania: Tickets on sale now for 2-night WWE event at Raymond James Stadium
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/sports/">
               Sports
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-19T17:06:11-04:00">
               1 day ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/sports/wrestlemania-tickets-on-sale-now-for-2-night-wwe-event-at-raymond-james-stadium/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6453250">

            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/florida/gov-desantis-change-in-age-eligibility-at-florida-vaccination-site-not-mayors-decision-to-make/">

              <div class="image-wrapper square vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6456423">

              </div>

                  </style>

        <section class="article-list article-list--headline-list article-list--has-multiple">
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Tampa Hoy
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="933799" data-collection="article-list4" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list4" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/tampa-hoy/nacional/video-hermosas-ondas-bioluminiscentes-capturadas-en-camara-a-lo-largo-de-la-costa-de-california/">
                VIDEO: Hermosas ondas bioluminiscentes capturadas en cámara a lo largo de la costa de California
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/tampa-hoy/nacional/">
                Nacional
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-19T22:51:00-04:00">
                1 day ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/tampa-hoy/nacional/video-hermosas-ondas-bioluminiscentes-capturadas-en-camara-a-lo-largo-de-la-costa-de-california/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6454925">
                 <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px" src="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2021/03/Beautiful-bioluminescent-waves-captured-on-camera-along-California-coast.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2021/03/Beautiful-bioluminescent-waves-captured-on-camera-along-California-coast.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2021/03/Beautiful-bioluminescent-waves-captured-on-camera-along-California-coast.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2021/03/Beautiful-bioluminescent-waves-captured-on-camera-along-California-coast.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://www.wfla.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/71/2021/03/Beautiful-bioluminescent-waves-captured-on-camera-along-California-coast.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w,                 </div>
                <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
                 <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
                  <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

              </a>
             </figure>

          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            National
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="933511" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="0">

               </a>

       </main>
      </div>
      <section class="widget-area" id="secondary">

         <div class="rich-text-cascade">
          <style>
           .widget_custom_html {
        width:100%;
}
.main-alert-wrapper {
	background-color: #000000;
	width: 320px;
	font-family: Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;
	padding: 15px 10px 10px 10px;
}

.alert-message {
	color: white;
	margin-left: 15px;
	display: inline-block;
	font-weight: 700;
    	text-transform: uppercase;
    	position: relative;
	letter-spacing: .05em;
    	z-index: 2;
}

.alert-text {
	color: white;
	margin-left: 10px;
	display: inline-block;
	font-weight: 400;
    	letter-spacing: .05em;
    	position: relative;
    	z-index: 2;

}
.live-now  {
 	float: left;
	background-color: #cc1f3b;
    	border-radius: .75rem;
    	content: " ";
    	display: block;
    	height: .75rem;
    	margin-top: .1875rem;
    	width: .75rem;
	}

  .site-promo__apps h2, .site-promo__weather-apps h2 {
      font-family: Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;
      font-size: .6875rem;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height: 1;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      margin: .9375rem 0;
  }

  .site-promo__apps .app-links, .site-promo__weather-apps .app-links {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -ms-flex-pack: center;
    justify-content: center;
    margin: 0 0 .5rem;
}

.site-promo {
    color:
    #fff;
    font-family: arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;
    text-align: center;
}

.app-links .app-link {
    margin: 0 .225rem;
}
          </style>

       <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-3">
        <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="" data-context="headline_list">
         <h2 class="article-list__heading">
          Don't Miss
         </h2>
         <div class="article-list__content">
          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="932100" data-collection="article-list11" data-index="0">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/hillsborough-county/metaphor-for-life-makes-cents-jewelry-stops-in-tampa-bay-raising-money-for-mental-health-awareness/">
              Metaphor for life: ‘Makes Cents Jewelry’ stops in Tampa Bay, raising money for mental health awareness
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/hillsborough-county/">
              Hillsborough County
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-03-18T18:24:22-04:00">
              2 days ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
            <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://www.wfla.com/news/hillsborough-county/metaphor-for-life-makes-cents-jewelry-stops-in-tampa-bay-raising-money-for-mental-health-awareness/">
             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
              <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6450590">
